meanings: the manager of an enterprise, a chief executive, a responsible manager
a person responsible for supporting (the family), a breadwinner

vlive.korean: 네? 저는 총책임자. - 보민 씨는 또 작업반장. Yes? I am the person in charge. - Bo Min is the leader again. 듣기 View video Golden Child : [FULL] Golden Child 3RD MINI ALBUM [WISH] COMEBACK SHOWCASE
vlive.english: Yes? I am the person in charge. - Bo Min is the leader again.

vlive.korean: 책임자에게 물어보세요. - 이름이 뭐에요? Ask our director. - What's your name? 듣기 View video V Beauty : 생생한 포토월 인터뷰 with CL @ MCM London Show
vlive.english: Ask our director. - What's your name?

vlive.korean: 예쁜 누님이 여기 책임자신가 봐? Hey, Pretty. I guess you are the head here. 듣기 View video 아이엠 (I am) : <사랑, 기억에 머물다> 3-2화 [시작]
vlive.english: Hey, Pretty. I guess you are the head here.

vlive.korean: 저 분이 책임잔데요, 저 분께 물어보세요. She is in charge. You could talk to her. 듣기 View video V Beauty : 생생한 포토월 인터뷰 with CL @ MCM London Show
vlive.english: She is in charge. You could talk to her.

vlive.korean: [최고의 책임자이자] 셔누는 사실 최고의 책임자라고 봐요. [With grave responsibility] He's like the CEO. 듣기 View video MONSTA X : [REPLAY] MONSTA X-RAY (몬스타엑스레이) _6화
vlive.english: [With grave responsibility] He's like the CEO.
